remarks: The set of vectors belonging to the orthocomplemented subspace of a projection.  Second part of Theorem 27.3 of [Halmos] p. 45. (Contributed by NM, 24-Apr-2006.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pjocvec $p |- ( H e. CH -> ( _|_ ` H ) = { x e. ~H | ( ( projh ` H ) ` x ) = 0h } ) $.
$d H x $.
